com.parkingwang.hichart.empty

类 EmptyTextRender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingwang.hichart.render.BaseRender
      • com.parkingwang.hichart.empty.EmptyTextRender
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    EmptyRender, Render

    public class EmptyTextRender
extends BaseRender
implements EmptyRender
    Draw the text in the center of the line chart if there has no data.
    从以下版本开始:
    2017-06-14 0.1
    作者:
    黄浩杭 (huanghaohang@parkingwang.com)
